import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { getStudentByID } from "../store/actions/studentActions"; import { getIssueBookBySid } from "../store/actions/studentActions"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; export class detail_student extends Component { state = { get_student : {} } componentDidMount(){ this.props.getStudentByID(this.props.match.params.sid); } componentDidUpdate() { setTimeout(() => this.setState({ get_student: this.props.std }), 20); } render() { let {get_student} =this.state return (

STUDENT DETAILS

NAME {get_student.s_name}
ID NO {get_student.s_roll}
CONTACT NO {get_student.s_contact}
E-MAIL {get_student.s_email}
SESSION {get_student.sess_name}
YEAR {get_student.y_year}
ADDRESS {get_student.s_address}
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ std: state.std.student }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, {getStudentByID}) (detail_student);
